job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pOur client is a latestage software security unicorn currently experiencing exponential growth from an unprecedented increase in market demand This is an opportunity to partake in an IPO and make a substantial impact on the product within a growing engineering organizationnbspnbspppnbspppAs a member of the Platform Engineering Team you will design develop and deploy code critical to maintaining software on different platforms bridging the gap between hardware and softwarenbspnbspppbrppAre you ready for a highly collaborative and exhilarating work environmentnbspppnbspppstrongResponsibilities you will take onstrongnbsppulliDesign Develop and Deploy Code 80nbspnbspliliImplement Python tooling scripts APIs for the development team and the productnbspliliUsenbsprelational and nonrelational databases tonbsppromote data flownbspliulpnbspppstrongYour ProfilestrongnbsppulliBS or MS STEM Degree lili13 years ofnbspexperience designing andnbspdeployingnbspsoftwarenbspliliProficiencynbspwith modern programming languagesnbspsuch as Python ornbspModern CliliExperience withnbspUnixLinuxnbspliliComfortablenbspdebugging testing and documentingnbspliulpstrongNice to havestrongnbsppulliCloud computing experience AWS AzurenbspetcnbspliliFamiliarity withnbspCICD systemsnbspliliExperience with infrastructure as code such as TerraformnbspliliDocker andornbspPodmannbspexposurenbspliulpnbspppIf you are currently open to new opportunities and want to take your career to the next level please contact me to discuss this opportunity along with alternativenbspEngineeringnbsppositions within the Austin Computer Software Technology SpacenbspppAll conversations are confidential and we will only submit your information after attaining your consentnbspp
